name: Laundry Mania: Daycare Activities Games For Girls
name_original: Laundry Mania: Daycare Activities Games For Girls
description:
Wash your Cloth With The whole Laundry Process like cloth washing,Drying,Ironing and folding cloth and arranging in Cupboard.

It's laundry time for Wash Baby Cloths And Learn Laundry Process To Kid. learn how to wash and dry laundry. Kid Will Learn The Process Of Laundry And Wash Cloth Help Kid To Do This With Instructions In Game, Firstly help Kid in separating colored and white clothes. Then help in setting up the washing machine and wash and dry the laundry. Lastly, help to learn how to iron the clothes.Main Focus Of This Education Game Is To Help The Kids In Process Of Laundry.


Learns how to wash laundry
dress is completely messed with mud so she decides to wash it. But she washed colored and white clothes together,Learn Process Of Dry All Cloths And Ironing the washed Cloths.
